ðŸ“– Summary: StreamingKokoroJS is a web-based text-to-speech application that leverages the Kokoro-82M model to generate high-quality speech audio entirely in the browser. It offers features like WebGPU acceleration, streaming audio generation, and multiple voice styles, all while running locally without server-side processing, ensuring privacy and offline functionality.
